## â“ Frequently Asked Questions {.section-title}

::: {.faq-section}

### What file formats do you work with?
FASTQ, BAM, VCF, h5ad, Seurat objects, CSV/TSV, Excel, and most genomics formats.

### Do you sign NDAs?
Yes, I'm happy to sign NDAs for confidential projects.

### Can you work with proprietary data?
Absolutely. I have 9+ years experience with pharma/biotech confidential datasets.

### Do you provide publication support?
Yes! I can write Methods sections, create supplementary analyses, and prepare publication-quality figures.

### Can you train my team?
Yes, I offer custom workshops on R/Bioconductor, reproducible workflows, and NGS best practices.

### What is your typical project timeline?
- **Small projects** (RNA-seq analysis): 2-4 weeks
- **Medium projects** (scRNA-seq, pipelines): 4-8 weeks
- **Large projects** (multi-omics, ML): 8-16 weeks

### How do you ensure reproducibility?
All analyses include version-controlled code (Git), containerization (Docker), detailed documentation (Quarto/RMarkdown), and comprehensive reports with session info.

:::
